table.name: mycrm_quickview
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `mycrm_quickview` ( `fieldid` int(19) NOT NULL, `related_fieldid` int(19) NOT NULL, `sequence` int(19) NOT NULL, `view` int(19) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_1_mycrm_quickview FOREIGN KEY (`fieldid`) REFERENCES `mycrm_field` (`fieldid`) ON DELETE CASCADE )
